00314 typedef union
00315 {
00320   struct
00321   {
00322     uint32_t  structType : 2;   
00323     uint32_t  reserved0  : 1;
00324     uint32_t  structReq  : 1;   
00325     uint32_t  xferCnt    : 11;  
00326     uint32_t  byteSwap   : 1;   
00327     uint32_t  blockSize  : 4;   
00328     uint32_t  doneIfs    : 1;   
00329     uint32_t  reqMode    : 1;   
00330     uint32_t  decLoopCnt : 1;   
00331     uint32_t  ignoreSrec : 1;   
00332     uint32_t  srcInc     : 2;   
00333     uint32_t  size       : 2;   
00334     uint32_t  dstInc     : 2;   
00335     uint32_t  srcAddrMode: 1;   
00336     uint32_t  dstAddrMode: 1;   
00338     uint32_t  srcAddr;          
00339     uint32_t  dstAddr;          
00341     uint32_t  linkMode   : 1;   
00342     uint32_t  link       : 1;   
00343     int32_t   linkAddr   : 30;  
00344   } xfer;

00444 #define LDMA_INIT_DEFAULT                                                                   \
00445 {                                                                                           \
00446   .ldmaInitCtrlNumFixed     = _LDMA_CTRL_NUMFIXED_DEFAULT, /* Fixed priority arbitration. */ \
00447   .ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsClrEn = 0,                           /* No PRS Synctrig clear enable*/ \
00448   .ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsSetEn = 0,                           /* No PRS Synctrig set enable. */ \
00449   .ldmaInitIrqPriority      = 3                            /* IRQ priority level 3.       */ \
00450 }

00456 #define LDMA_TRANSFER_CFG_MEMORY()              \
00457 {                                               \
00458   0, 0, 0, 0, 0,                                \
00459   false, false, ldmaCfgArbSlotsAs1,             \
00460   ldmaCfgSrcIncSignPos, ldmaCfgDstIncSignPos, 0 \
00461 }
00462 
00467 #define LDMA_TRANSFER_CFG_MEMORY_LOOP( loopCnt) \
00468 {                                               \
00469   0, 0, 0, 0, 0,                                \
00470   false, false, ldmaCfgArbSlotsAs1,             \
00471   ldmaCfgSrcIncSignPos, ldmaCfgDstIncSignPos,   \
00472   loopCnt                                       \
00473 }
00474 
00479 #define LDMA_TRANSFER_CFG_PERIPHERAL( signal )  \
00480 {                                               \
00481   signal, 0, 0, 0, 0,                           \
00482   false, false, ldmaCfgArbSlotsAs1,             \
00483   ldmaCfgSrcIncSignPos, ldmaCfgDstIncSignPos, 0 \
00484 }
00485 
00490 #define LDMA_TRANSFER_CFG_PERIPHERAL_LOOP( signal, loopCnt )  \
00491 {                                                             \
00492   signal, 0, 0, 0, 0,                                         \
00493   false, false, ldmaCfgArbSlotsAs1,                           \
00494   ldmaCfgSrcIncSignPos, ldmaCfgDstIncSignPos, loopCnt         \
00495 }

00504 #define LDMA_DESCRIPTOR_SINGLE_M2M_WORD( src, dest, count ) \
00505 {                                                           \
00506   .xfer =                                                   \
00507   {                                                         \
00508     .structType   = ldmaCtrlStructTypeXfer,                 \
00509     .structReq    = 1,                                      \
00510     .xferCnt      = ( count ) - 1,                          \
00511     .byteSwap     = 0,                                      \
00512     .blockSize    = ldmaCtrlBlockSizeUnit1,                 \
00513     .doneIfs      = 1,                                      \
00514     .reqMode      = ldmaCtrlReqModeAll,                     \
00515     .decLoopCnt   = 0,                                      \
00516     .ignoreSrec   = 0,                                      \
00517     .srcInc       = ldmaCtrlSrcIncOne,                      \
00518     .size         = ldmaCtrlSizeWord,                       \
00519     .dstInc       = ldmaCtrlDstIncOne,                      \
00520     .srcAddrMode  = ldmaCtrlSrcAddrModeAbs,                 \
00521     .dstAddrMode  = ldmaCtrlDstAddrModeAbs,                 \
00522     .srcAddr      = (uint32_t)(src),                        \
00523     .dstAddr      = (uint32_t)(dest),                       \
00524     .linkMode     = 0,                                      \
00525     .link         = 0,                                      \
00526     .linkAddr     = 0                                       \
00527   }                                                         \
00528 }
00529 
00537 #define LDMA_DESCRIPTOR_SINGLE_M2M_HALF( src, dest, count ) \
00538 {                                                           \
